#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

// Returns true if n is a Fibinacci Number, else false
bool issum(long long n)
{
    long long x = (long long)sqrt(1+8*n);
    if (x*x == (1+8*n) && (x-1)%2 ==0 )
    {//cout<<x*x<<" "<<(1+8*n)<<" ";
        return true;
    }
    else return false;

}
int main()
{
    int T;
    cin>>T;
    long long int N,K;
    int zero=0;
    while(T--)
    {
    cin>>N>>K;


   int l = N*(N+1)/2;

   if(issum(K) && K!=0)  l--;

   cout<<l<<endl;
    }
}
